kv8.9:1.1: Kusalena cittena samuṭṭhitaṁ kāyakammaṁ rūpaṁ kusalanti?
kv8.9:1.3: Sārammaṇaṁ, atthi tassa āvaṭṭanā ābhogo samannāhāro manasikāro cetanā patthanā paṇidhīti?
kv8.9:1.5: nanu anārammaṇaṁ, natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā ābhogo samannāhāro manasikāro cetanā patthanā paṇidhīti?
kv8.9:1.7: Hañci anārammaṇaṁ, natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv8.9:2.1: Kusalena cittena samuṭṭhito phasso kusalo sārammaṇo, atthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv8.9:2.3: Kusalena cittena samuṭṭhitaṁ kāyakammaṁ rūpaṁ kusalaṁ sārammaṇaṁ, atthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv8.9:2.12: paññā kusalā sārammaṇā, atthi tāya āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv8.9:2.14: Kusalena cittena samuṭṭhitaṁ kāyakammaṁ rūpaṁ kusalaṁ sārammaṇaṁ, atthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv8.9:3.1: Kusalena cittena samuṭṭhitaṁ kāyakammaṁ rūpaṁ kusalaṁ anārammaṇaṁ, natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv8.9:3.3: Kusalena cittena samuṭṭhito phasso kusalo anārammaṇo, natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?

kv8.9:3.14: paññā kusalā anārammaṇā, natthi tāya āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?

kv8.9:18.17: anottappaṁ akusalaṁ sārammaṇaṁ, atthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?

kv8.9:33.6: Hañci kāyakammaṁ vacīkammaṁ kusalampi akusalampi, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv8.9:34.19: vāyodhātu asuci assu lohitaṁ sedo kusalopi akusalopīti?
kv8.9:37.5: cetayitvā kammaṁ karoti kāyena vācāya manasā”ti.
kv8.9:38.4: “kāye vā, ānanda, sati kāyasañcetanāhetu uppajjati ajjhattaṁ sukhadukkhaṁ;
kv8.9:38.5: vācāya vā, ānanda, sati vacīsañcetanāhetu uppajjati ajjhattaṁ sukhadukkhaṁ;
kv8.9:38.6: mane vā, ānanda, sati manosañcetanāhetu uppajjati ajjhattaṁ sukhadukkhan”ti.
kv8.9:39.4: “tividhā, bhikkhave, kāyasañcetanā akusalaṁ kāyakammaṁ dukkhudrayaṁ dukkhavipākaṁ;
kv8.9:39.5: catubbidhā, bhikkhave, vacīsañcetanā akusalaṁ vacīkammaṁ dukkhudrayaṁ dukkhavipākaṁ;
kv8.9:39.6: tividhā, bhikkhave, manosañcetanā akusalaṁ manokammaṁ dukkhudrayaṁ dukkhavipākaṁ;
kv8.9:39.7: tividhā, bhikkhave, kāyasañcetanā kusalaṁ kāyakammaṁ sukhudrayaṁ sukhavipākaṁ;
kv8.9:39.8: catubbidhā, bhikkhave, vacīsañcetanā kusalaṁ vacīkammaṁ sukhudrayaṁ sukhavipākaṁ;
kv8.9:39.9: tividhā, bhikkhave, manosañcetanā kusalaṁ manokammaṁ sukhudrayaṁ sukhavipākan”ti.
kv8.9:40.4: “sacāyaṁ, ānanda, samiddhi moghapuriso pāṭaliputtassa paribbājakassa evaṁ puṭṭho evaṁ byākareyya—
kv8.9:40.5: ‘sañcetaniyaṁ, āvuso pāṭaliputta, kammaṁ katvā kāyena vācāya manasā sukhavedaniyaṁ sukhaṁ so vedayati;
kv8.9:40.6: sañcetaniyaṁ, āvuso pāṭaliputta, kammaṁ katvā kāyena vācāya manasā dukkhavedaniyaṁ dukkhaṁ so vedayati;
kv8.9:40.7: sañcetaniyaṁ, āvuso pāṭaliputta, kammaṁ katvā kāyena vācāya manasā adukkhamasukhavedaniyaṁ adukkhamasukhaṁ so vedayatī’ti, evaṁ byākaramāno kho, ānanda, samiddhi moghapuriso pāṭaliputtassa paribbājakassa sammā byākaramāno byākareyyā”ti.
